97538.name: Weekly home production time by demographic group (Ramey and Francis (2009))
97538.description: Time spent in home production activities by age group. Home production activities include planning, purchasing goods and services (except medical and personal care services), care of children and adults (both in the household and outside the household), general cleaning, care and repair of the house and grounds (including yard work, but excluding gardening), preparing and clearing food, making, mending, and laundering of clothing and other household textiles.
97538.datasetName: A Century of Work and Leisure - Ramey and Francis (2009)

source.name: Ramey and Francis (2009)
source.dataPublishedBy: Ramey, V.A. and Francis, N., 2009. A century of work and leisure. American Economic Journal: Macroeconomics, 1(2), pp.189-224.
source.dataPublisherSource: Census and current population surveys, time use surveys, census data and government statistics
